summary: This document is an email forwarding a voice message attachment related to the Epstein case, sent from an unknown sender to the US Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York (USANYS) Epstein Victims unit. The email includes a timestamp and a .wav file attachment containing the voice message.

events.title: Voice Message Forwarded to US Attorney's Office
events.description: An email was sent to the US Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York's Epstein Victims unit, forwarding a voice message attachment (.wav file) for their attention.

keyFacts: A voice message was forwarded to the US Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York (USANYS) Epstein Victims unit on July 29, 2019.
The communication includes an attached .wav audio file named '20190729 090311.wav'.
The email subject references 'Voice Message Attached', indicating the primary content is an audio recording.
The timestamp shows the voice message was created at 9:03:11 AM on July 29, 2019.
This document represents investigative correspondence potentially containing victim or witness information.
